name: ArcHive (Mo, ThadMuchnok)
description:
SUBMISSION FOR 2021 GITHUB GAMEOFF

CONTROLS

  • w,a,s,d & arrow keys to walk
  • Left-click to attack
  • Right-click to parry
  • Tab or T for inventory
  • 1-3 Weapon Selection
  • Shift to Dash

DESCRIPTION

Adventure through Arcden, the city of lies and magic, and explore the story of Gael Remington -- a mercenary who's visiting home. Gael's adventure in Arcden challenges their values and their loyalty to humanity itself as a sinister bug infestation spreads throughout the city. Only YOU can answer the question: Where will you be tomorrow?

FEATURES

  • Challenging battles
  • Branching Dialogue
  • Multiple Endings
  • Shopping!!!
  • A Doggie <3

MILKYWAY STUDIOS

We're college students who love games so much we decided to make them! Thank you for checking out ArcHive.

CREDITS

  • Systems & Development: Thaddeus, Jullian
  • Music: Jullian
  • Story: Morgan
  • Art & UI: Hanna, Diana, Morgan

NOTES

This game was designed so that players would explore the world and interact with it! Enjoy your time at Arcden!

Some advice for some known bugs:

- Stay on the paths of Arcden so you don't get lost!

- If you die and respawn as if dead, left-click to restore yourself.
